title: Behind the Mist
description: A brave teen. A unicorn-in-training. A once-in-an-afterlife chance to save the world. Nick and his horse Jazz are best friends forever. And to stay by his side, Nick wouldgo to the ends of the Earth. But when a tragic accident takes both their lives, he'sstunned to wake up next to Jazz in horse heaven...Jazz loves Nick with his whole heart. So when he's granted the opportunity tobecome a guardian unicorn in the hereafter, he turns down the great honor unlesshis young friend can ride along.But the Council of the Twelve Ancients will only allow such an unusual request ifboth horse and human can prove they are worthy. Tasked with muzzling a power-hungry traitor, Nick and Jazz must gallop into action to stop an evil band ofbetrayers.Can Jazz and Nick find the strength to defeat their galloping nemesis?Behind the Mist is the enchanting first book in The Mist Trilogy middle-grade fantasyseries. If your child likes mythical creatures, unbreakable friendships, and magicaladventures, then you'll both love M.J. Evans's heartwarming tale.Buy Behind the Mist to saddle up and ride into adventure today! Behind the Mist is a Gold Medal Winner of the 2014 Mom's Choice Award!
author: M.J. Evans
